name: Fruitopia (itch)
description:
Welcome to the abandoned city of Fruitopia, what happened here? Try and piece together the history surrounding this once magnificent city.

Trailer:

"Fruitopia is a game" - Liam 'Tome Raider' Conneely

"My ass is feeling it, but my mind is thinking it, 9.69/10" - Kris 2016

Link to the essay: https://cianongames.wordpress.com/2016/05/10/fruit...
